title: The Survivor
summary: One image from a session of hundreds—the one that survived every round of editing.
story: I shot 400 frames. This is the one. Everything else was destroyed.
quote: Kill your darlings, save the one that matters.

title: Reinvention
summary: A portrait that broke the rules of the original concept—and became stronger for it.
story: The brief said one thing. The image said another. I listened to the image.
technique: Deviation from planned direction based on instinct.

title: After the Cut
summary: What remains after aggressive editing—pure, essential, undeniable.
story: I removed everything that wasn't absolutely necessary.

title: Bold Choice
summary: An experimental frame that shouldn't work—but does.
story: Everyone said to cut this one. I kept it anyway.
